author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...HURRICANE HONE SOUTH OF SOUTH POINT ON THE BIG ISLAND...
summary:
...HURRICANE HONE SOUTH OF SOUTH POINT ON THE BIG ISLAND...
 As of 1:15 AM HST Sun Aug 25
 the center of Hone was located near 18.1, -155.6
 with movement W at 12 mph.
 The minimum central pressure was 991 mb
 with maximum sustained winds of about 75 mph.
